00055 #ifndef INDRI_PARSER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_PARSER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/ObjectHandler.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/UnparsedDocument.hpp"
00060 #include "indri/ParsedDocument.hpp"
00061 #include <map>
00062 #include <vector>
00063 
00064 namespace indri {
00065   class Parser : public ObjectHandler<UnparsedDocument> {
00066   public:
00067     virtual ~Parser() {};
00068 
00069     virtual ParsedDocument* parse( UnparsedDocument* document ) = 0;
00070     virtual void setTags( const std::vector<std::string>& include,
00071                           const std::vector<std::string>& exclude,
00072                           const std::vector<std::string>& index,
00073                           const std::vector<std::string>& metadata,
00074                           const std::map<std::string, std::string>& conflations ) = 0;
00075 
00076     virtual void handle( UnparsedDocument* document ) = 0;
00077     virtual void setHandler( ObjectHandler<ParsedDocument>& handler ) = 0;
00078   };
00079 }
00080 
00081 #endif // INDRI_PARSER_HPP
